compare.label: Block "Compare" in the Header
compare.comment: If disabled, block "Compare" will be displayed in Magento's default position (left sidebar).

hide_on_mobile.label: Hide Empty Cart on Mobile Devices
hide_on_mobile.comment: Empty cart can be hidden on mobile devices (if browser viewport is narrower than 480 pixels).

top_links_icons_style1.label: Link Style (Above 640 px)
top_links_icons_style1.comment: Style of links if browser viewport width is above 640 px.

top_links_icons_style2.label: Link Style (Below 640 px)
top_links_icons_style2.comment: Style of links if browser viewport width is below 640 px.

aspect_ratio.label: Keep Image Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.comment: Set "Yes", to keep aspect ratio of the product image (height of the image will be calculated automatically based on width). If set to "No", Magento will automatically transform each image into square. If the original image was rectangular, the empty space at the sides will be filled with white color.

image_width.label: Image Width
image_width.comment:
Width of the product image. If width is not specified, default width will be used (295 pixels). Remember that in the category view the visual size of the product image depends on the number of columns. For example, if you increase the number of columns, columns will be narrower so there will be less space for product image in each column.
Important: in Magento 1.9.1.0 (or later) enter exactly the same value in the "Small Image Width" field which can be found under
System > Catalog > Product Image.

alt_image.label: Alternative Image
alt_image.comment: Show alternative image on mouse hover over the main image.

alt_image_column.label: Select Alt. Image By Column
alt_image_column.comment: Which column of the product image gallery will mark alternative images of your products.

alt_image_column_value.label: Alt. Image Column Value
alt_image_column_value.comment: Specify the value which will mark alternative images of your products. E.g.: if Select Alt. Image By Column is set to "Sort Order", specify the number which will mark (in "Sort Order" column of the product image gallery) alternative images, for example: "2".

column_count.label: Number of Columns
column_count.comment:
Number of products displayed in a single row, if the value of Maximum Page Width is set to 1024 px.
Important: if the value of Maximum Page Width is bigger, the number of columns will be automatically increased to show more products in a row. For example: if the Number of Columns = 3 and the Maximum Page Width = 1280 px, then 4 products in a row will be displayed.

column_count_768.label: Number of Columns Below 768px
column_count_768.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 640 px and 768 px.

column_count_640.label: Number of Columns Below 640px
column_count_640.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 480px and 640 px.

column_count_480.label: Number of Columns Below 480px
column_count_480.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 320 px and 480 px. Below that width products are displayed in a single column.

style_boxed.label: Boxed Style [beta]
style_boxed.comment: Grid items displayed with "borders" (color of "borders" can be changed in Theme Design section). Feature is in beta version.

equal_height.label: Equal Height of Grid Items (Products)
equal_height.comment: If enabled, all grid items have the same height and "Add to cart" button is displayed at the bottom edge of the item.

hover_effect.label: Product Hover Effect
hover_effect.comment:
Emphasize the product on mouse hover over the product.
Important: enable in order to use "Display On Hover" in Display Selected Elements. Otherwise displaying elements on mouse hover over the product will not work properly.

disable_hover_effect.label: Disable Hover Effect Below...
disable_hover_effect.comment: Product Hover Effect will be disabled if width of the browser viewport is below selected value.

hide_addto_links.label: Hide "Add to" Links Below...
hide_addto_links.comment: "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links will be hidden if width of the browser viewport is below selected value.

centered.label: Align Center
centered.comment: Align center elements of the grid item: product name, price, button etc.

display_name_single_line.label: Display Name in Single Line
display_name_single_line.comment: If set to "Yes": if product name is too long to be displayed in a single line, it will be clipped and an ellipsis ('…', U+2026 HORIZONTAL ELLIPSIS) will be appended at the end of the line to represent clipped text. This will only take effect if the field Name is set to "Display".

display_addtolinks.label: "Add to" Links
display_addtolinks.comment: "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links.

addtolinks_simple.label: Show "Add to" Links as Icons Above the Image
addtolinks_simple.comment: If set to "No", "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links will be displayed as text links. Otherwise, links will be displayed as simple icons above the product image.

style_boxed.label: Boxed Style
style_boxed.comment: List items displayed with "borders" (color can be changed in Theme Design section).

hover_effect.label: Product Hover Effect
hover_effect.comment: Effect is visible on mouse hover over the product.

addtolinks_simple.label: Show "Add to" Links as Simple Icons
addtolinks_simple.comment: If set to "No", "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links will be displayed as text links with icons.

product_page.label: Product Page
product_page.comment:
IMPORTANT:
Width of the product page columns (Image Column, Primary Column, Secondary Column) is specified in grid units. Sum of all columns has to be equal 12 grid units.

image_column.label: Image Column Width
image_column.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 4 and 8).

primary_column.label: Primary Column Width
primary_column.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 3 and 8).

secondary_column.label: Secondary Column Width
secondary_column.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 8). Leave empty to remove this column.

replace_related.label: Related Products
replace_related.comment: To replace Related Products first enable static block with ID block_product_replace_related

related_count.label: Number of Visible Products
related_count.comment: Number of related products displayed in each slide.

related_timeout.label: Timeout
related_timeout.comment: To enable automatic scrolling of the slider, specify time (in milliseconds) between transitions. Leave empty to disable automatic scrolling. Note that 1000 miliseconds = 1 second.

replace_upsell.label: Up-sell Products
replace_upsell.comment: To replace Up-sell Products first enable static block with ID block_product_replace_upsell

upsell_timeout.label: Timeout
upsell_timeout.comment: To enable automatic scrolling of the slider, specify time (in milliseconds) between transitions. Leave empty to disable automatic scrolling. Note that 1000 miliseconds = 1 second.

product_slider.label: Product Sliders
product_slider.comment: This section is related to all existing product sliders. "Timeout" will be applied only to Featured Products Slider and New Products Slider. "Timeout" for Related Products and Up-Sell Products (blocks on product page) can be set in Product Page tab.

timeout.label: Timeout
timeout.comment: To enable automatic scrolling of the sliders, specify time (in milliseconds) between slide transitions. Leave empty to disable automatic scrolling. Note that 1000 miliseconds = 1 second.

speed.label: Speed
speed.comment: Duration (in milliseconds) of scrolling animation. Applied to scrolling with arrows (and touch swipe).

auto_speed.label: Automatic Scrolling Speed
auto_speed.comment: Duration (in milliseconds) of scrolling animation. Applied to automatic scrolling (if Timeout was specified) and to scrolling with pagination.

pause.label: Pause on Hover
pause.comment: If enabled, when the slider is mouseovered then the automatic scrolling will pause.

lazy.label: Lazy Loading
lazy.comment: Delays loading of images. If enabled, images outside of viewport will not be loaded before user scrolls to them.

magento_blocks.label: Default Magento Blocks
magento_blocks.comment: In this section you can disable default Magento blocks.

top_links.label: Top Links
top_links.comment: Links in the header: Accoun, Wishlist, Log In etc.

footer_links.label: Footer Links
footer_links.comment: Links in the footer: Site Map, Orders and Returns, Contact Us etc.

sidebar_blocks_home.label: Disable Sidebar Blocks (On Home Page)
sidebar_blocks_home.comment: In this section you can disable blocks which are displayed in sidebars. These setting only affect the home page.

install.label: Data Import
install.comment:
IMPORTANT:
in case you need the original content of some static blocks or pages
XML files with all static blocks and pages can be found in the following directory:
app/code/local/Infortis/Fortis/etc/import/

heading_buttons.label: Theme Configuration Import/Export
heading_buttons.sublabel: Click to go to the import/export page

import_blocks.label: Static Blocks
import_blocks.comment: Click this button to create all static blocks provided with this theme.

overwrite_blocks.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
overwrite_blocks.comment: If set to "Yes", imported blocks will overwrite existing blocks with the same identifiers (if any blocks with the same identifiers already exist). To change value of this field, save the configuration (without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the page).

import_pages.label: Pages
import_pages.comment: Click this button to create CMS pages provided with this theme.

overwrite_pages.label: Overwrite Existing Pages
overwrite_pages.comment: If set to "Yes", imported pages will overwrite existing pages with the same identifiers (if any pages with the same identifiers already exist). To change value of this field, save the configuration (without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the page).

custom_css.label: Load Custom CSS
custom_css.comment: Enable this option to load "custom.css" file in which you can override the default styling of the theme. To create "custom.css" you can use the file "SAMPLE.custom.css" which is located in skin/frontend/fortis/default/css directory.

colors.label: Colors
colors.comment: In this tab, you can configure basic colors. Settings from this tab are inherited by all the other sections. Some of the settings (such as text color) can be overridden in other sections.

button_active_bg_color.label: Button Active Background Color
button_active_bg_color.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, e.g. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout" etc.

button_active_color.label: Button Active Text Color
button_active_color.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, e.g. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout" etc.

additional_bg_color.label: Additional Background Color
additional_bg_color.comment: Background color used to emphasize some elements and blocks, e.g. totals on the cart page

font_size.label: Basic Font Size
font_size.comment: Size of the regular text. Font size of most of the other elements will be calculated relative to this value.

primary_font_family_group.label: Heading Font Family
primary_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

primary_font_family_custom.label: Custom
primary_font_family_custom.comment:
Type in your custom font stack, e.g.:
Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif.
Important: Do not add trailing semicolon.

primary_font_family.label: Google Fonts
primary_font_family.comment:
Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts
Important: most of the fonts from Google are not available in all weights. Make sure that you specified correct weight (field Font Weight below) for selected font. Otherwise font will not be displayed. Refer to Google Web Fonts to check if the selected weight is available for your font.

primary_char_subset.label: Character Sets
primary_char_subset.comment:
Some of the fonts support multiple scripts (like Latin and Cyrillic for example). You need to select at least one character set.
Important: not all fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets refer to Google Web Fonts.
Important: using multiple character sets affects performance, so only select the character sets that you actually need.

primary_font_weight.label: Font Weight
primary_font_weight.comment:
Specify the weight of the font. You can only use numeric font weights which are available for the CSS property font-weight. E.g. normal weight is 400, bold is 700. Leave empty to use default weight.
Important: if you selected a font from Google Fonts, note that some fonts are not available in all weights. Refer to Google Web Fonts to check if the selected weight is available for your font.

shadow.label: Content Area Shadow
shadow.comment: If enabled, all sections with nontransparent Inner Background Color, will drop shadow.

structural_elements_transition.label: Structural Elements Transition
structural_elements_transition.comment: If enabled, main structural elements of the page layout will be animated during web browser window resizing.

viewport_bg_color.label: Viewport Background Color
viewport_bg_color.comment: Background color of the web browser viewport (applied for HTML body element). Set the same color as for footer background to avoid blank space below the footer on large screens.

bg_color.label: Page Background Color
bg_color.comment: Background color applied for all sections of the page: header, main content area and footer

header.label: Header
header.comment: In this tab, you can configure the header section of the page.

stretched.label: Stretched
stretched.comment: If set to "Yes", side padding of the header will be removed. Header will have the same width as the width of the content area of the main section of the page.

icon_animate.label: Animate Icons
icon_animate.comment: Animation will only take effect if icon on mouse hover have different color than standard icon, e.g. if option "White | Black on hover" was selected.

icon_opacity.label: Icon Opacity (%)
icon_opacity.comment: Enter number between 0 and 100. 0 is fully transparent, 100 is fully opaque.

icon_hover_opacity.label: Icon Hover Opacity (%)
icon_hover_opacity.comment: Enter number between 0 and 100. 0 is fully transparent, 100 is fully opaque.

user_menu_bg_color_opacity.label: Link Background Color Opacity (%)
user_menu_bg_color_opacity.comment: Opacity of the background color. Enter number between 0 and 100. 0 is fully transparent, 100 is fully opaque.

user_menu_hover_bg_color_opacity.label: Link Hover Background Color Opacity (%)
user_menu_hover_bg_color_opacity.comment: Opacity of the background color when mouse hovers over the link. Enter number between 0 and 100.

bg_color_opacity.label: Background Color Opacity (%)
bg_color_opacity.comment: Opacity of the background color. Enter number between 0 and 100. 0 is fully transparent, 100 is fully opaque.

content_padding_top.label: Content Top Padding
content_padding_top.comment: Specify additional padding at the top of the content area of this section. Use when you want to move the content away from the top edge of the content area. Especially useful if you also configured the inner background color for this section (field: Header - Top > Inner Background Color) and the top gap for the entire header (field Header > Gap at the Top). Value in pixels.

content_padding_bottom.label: Content Bottom Padding
content_padding_bottom.comment: Specify additional padding at the bottom of the content area of this section. Similar to Content Top Padding. Value in pixels.

content_padding_top.label: Content Top Padding
content_padding_top.comment: Specify additional padding at the top of the content area of this section. Use when you want to move the content away from the top edge of the content area. Especially useful if you also configured the inner background color for this section (field: Header - Primary > Inner Background Color). Value in pixels.

content_padding_bottom.label: Content Bottom Padding
content_padding_bottom.comment: Specify additional padding at the bottom of the content area of this section. Similar to Content Top Padding. Value in pixels.

outer_bg_color.label: Background Color
outer_bg_color.comment: Background color of the entire menu container, as wide as the widht of the browser viewport.

inner_bg_color.label: Inner Background Color (Outline)
inner_bg_color.comment:
Background color of the inner container. Set this color to display an outline around the menu items.
Note: if option Stretched is enabled, outline will not be visible because menu bar will cover the inner container.

content_padding_top.label: Content Top Padding
content_padding_top.comment:
Specify additional padding at the top of the inner container. Especially useful if you also configured the background color for the inner container:
Main Menu > Inner Background Color (Outline)
Specify value in pixels (do not add "px" suffix). You can also specify percentage value, in that case add % at the end of the number.

stretched.label: Stretched
stretched.comment: If set to "Yes", menu bar will be stretched to cover the inner container (it will have the same width as the width of the inner container).

bg_color.label: Item Background Color
bg_color.comment: This will be the background color of the menu bar.

parent_hover_bg_color.label: Item Parent Hover Background Color
parent_hover_bg_color.comment: This will be the background color of parent item (an item which has drop-down box).

level1_text_shadow_opacity.label: Item Text Shadow Opacity (%)
level1_text_shadow_opacity.comment: Opacity of the text shadow of the 1st-level items. Enter number between 0 and 100. 0 is fully transparent, 100 is fully opaque.

level1_hover_text_shadow_opacity.label: Item Hover Text Shadow Opacity (%)
level1_hover_text_shadow_opacity.comment: Opacity of the text shadow of the 1st-level item when item is active or on mouse hover over the item. Enter number between 0 and 100. 0 is fully transparent, 100 is fully opaque.

mega_lev1_font_size.label: Mega Drop-Down: 1st-Level Item Font Size
mega_lev1_font_size.comment: Font size of the items on the 1st-level inside "Mega drop-down".

mega_lev1_font_uppercase.label: Mega Drop-Down: 1st-Level Item Uppercase
mega_lev1_font_uppercase.comment: Uppercase of the items on the 1st-level inside "Mega drop-down".

mega_lev1_hover_bg_color.label: Mega Drop-Down: 1st-Level Item Hover Background Color

dropdown_shadow.label: Drop-down Shadow
dropdown_shadow.comment: If set to "Yes", drop-down boxes will drop shadow.

home_link_icon_color.label: Home Link Icon Color
home_link_icon_color.comment:
Color of the icon which is displayed if
Home Link: Single Icon was enabled in menu settings.

heading_menuicons.label: Icons: Mobile Menu and "Home Link: Inside Menu Item"

mobile_opener_current_color.label: Link Active Icon Color
mobile_opener_current_color.comment:
Colors of icons:
- in mobile menu: open/close buttons
- home icon which is displayed if
Home Link: Inside Menu Item was enabled in menu settings.

mobile_link_separator_color.label: Link Separator Color
mobile_link_separator_color.comment: Vertical space between links in mobile version of the main menu. Leave empty to remove separator.

mobile_shadow.label: Mobile Menu Drop-down Shadow
mobile_shadow.comment: If set to "Yes", mobile menu drop-down box will drop shadow if category contains any category blocks.

main.label: Main
main.comment: In this tab, you can configure the main content area - section of the page located between the header and the footer.

main_top.label: Breadcrumbs
main_top.comment: In this tab, you can configure the breadcrumbs section.

category.label: Category View
category.comment: In this tab, you can configure category view.

grid_bg_color.label: Background Color
grid_bg_color.comment: Background color of the grid and list when "Boxed Style" is enabled ("Boxed Style" can be enabled/disabled in Theme Settings section).

product_page.label: Product Page
product_page.comment: In this tab, you can configure the product page (in Magento also called "product view").

related_header_bg_color.label: Related Products Header Background Color
related_header_bg_color.comment: This color will be used if position of related products is set to "At the side of the tabs".

related_header_color.label: Related Products Header Color
related_header_color.comment: This color will be used if position of related products is set to "At the side of the tabs".

slideshow.label: Slideshow
slideshow.comment: In this tab, you can configure elements related to slideshows.

footer.label: Footer
footer.comment: In this tab, you can configure the footer section of the page. Settings from this tab are inherited by all the other sub-sections of the footer. Some of the settings can be overridden in sub-sections.

inner_bg_color_opacity.label: Inner Background Color Opacity (%)
inner_bg_color_opacity.comment: Opacity of the inner background color in Primary Footer. Enter number between 0 and 100. 0 is fully transparent, 100 is fully opaque.

padding_top.label: Top Padding
padding_top.comment: Specify additional gap above this section of the footer. Value in pixels.

padding_bottom.label: Bottom Padding
padding_bottom.comment: Specify additional gap below this section of the footer. Value in pixels.

max_width_custom.label: Custom Maximum Page Width (px)
max_width_custom.comment: Specify value in pixels, do not add "px" suffix.
